Author: half-bad
Text: I don't believe enough calories would be consumed to affect the weight loss effects of fasting, but some people do fasting for autophagy or other health reasons (lol not us) and that can get messed up by the insulin responses your body will have.

Author: bir_die
Text: It’s pretty much up to you. It’s your fast, so you set the “rules” for it.   Like if it’s a longer fast for me, I’ll allow soup with no chunky bits. Basically just a thickened broth. And protein shakes if I’m working out. Those are my “rules” for fasting. Some people’s fasting disallows ingesting anything but water. Some allow a single pickle for the electrolytes.   So it’s whatever you want.
